title: -cannot install -cannot do shit -come on riot
body: basically i uninstalled league because of personal reasons and tried to re-install it but it doesnt even load the page after i clicked on 'download game' . i did whatever i could with some risks and it still doesn't let me download the game at all. later on i found my usb that had a copy of lol and thought to use it but it seems that it is not possible due to firewall which i have turned off yet it still does not work. i'm not sure if i'm just noob at computer stuff but hey~ wtf rito~ come and fix this instead of working on new champions and stuff for the ones who can access lol. or yell at the people who are meant to do their jobs at fixing it... somebody pls teach me how to install (._.)

replies.body:
DW IT'S FINE, MY BROTHER JUST CONNECTED THE DNS SERVER TO GOOGLE
